headline: Nordson EFD Features Award-Winning PICO Nexμs for Medical Device Assembly in Booth 2715 at MD&M West, February 4 – 6, 2025
summary: EAST PROVIDENCE, R.I., January 21, 2025--Nordson EFD, a Nordson company (NASDAQ: NDSN), announced today it will showcase its standout PICO Nexμs jetting system at MD&M West being held at the Anaheim Convention Center, Anaheim, CA from February 4-6, 2025. In Booth 2715, medical device manufacturers can view this Smart Factory solution and its web-based interface for remote programming and on-demand inspection of fluid dispensing functions from a personal computer, laptop and other mobile devices.

content.title: Nordson EFD Features Award-Winning PICO Nexμs for Medical Device Assembly in Booth 2715 at MD&M West, February 4 – 6, 2025
content.summary: EAST PROVIDENCE, R.I., January 21, 2025--Nordson EFD, a Nordson company (NASDAQ: NDSN), announced today it will showcase its standout PICO Nexμs jetting system at MD&M West being held at the Anaheim Convention Center, Anaheim, CA from February 4-6, 2025. In Booth 2715, medical device manufacturers can view this Smart Factory solution and its web-based interface for remote programming and on-demand inspection of fluid dispensing functions from a personal computer, laptop and other mobile devices.

thumbnail.caption: Two PICO Nexμs jetting systems performing a needle-bonding application using a G4VPlus robot will demonstrate Nordson EFD's Smart Factory and IIOT solutions in booth 2715 at MD&M West 2025. (Photo: Business Wire)
